context_of_use: This use case allows customers to view order status and shipment tracking information until delivery.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer wants to know the delivery status of their orders.
description: This use case enables customers to track their orders and view shipment status.
triggering_event: Customer requests to track an order.
preconditions: Customer is logged into their account.
postconditions: Customer successfully views the order status and tracking information.
assumptions: The customer has access to the internet.
The order tracking system is operational.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to track their orders.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of tracking information provided.
main_flow: 1. Customer requests to track an order → System displays the order tracking interface.
2. Customer selects the order to track → System retrieves and displays the current status and tracking information.
